title: Kyndryl & IBM Japan Secure Deal to Unify Yamaguchi FG’s Regional Banking Systems by 2029
tags: SEC filing;Yamaguchi Financial Group launches nCino’s platform for mortgagesIn October 2023, Yamaguchi Financial Group (YMfg) decided to adopt the nCino Bank Operating System to integrate the entire process for mortgages, from application to approval and contracting. This platform will now launch on Monday, December 23, 2024.Japan FinTech ObserverNorbert Gehrke
